roleset.name: to live for an extended period

example.name: both arguments
example.text: [*] Having resided in the great state of California for the past seven years , I find it [*EXP*-3]hard [*] to ignore our environmental problems when I start my commute to work with eyes tearing [*RNR*-2] and head aching [*RNR*-2] from the polluted air [*T*-4] ; when I try [*-6] to enjoy the beaches and come home [*-6] covered [*-8] with tar and oil [*T*-5] ; when I hear of numerous deaths related [*] to irresponsible processing of cheese and use of chemicals in fruit growing [*T*-7] .
example.arg: in the great state of California

example.name: arg1
example.text: Three years ago , the exchange took up residence in a space-agetower of steel and glass -- evocative of the kind of modernarchitecture that Britain 's Prince Charles has denounced .
example.arg: in a space-agetower of steel and glass -- evocative of the kind of modernarchitecture that Britain 's Prince Charles has denounced

example.name: both args
example.text: During the time of his residence in Mourhead, Michael Higgins was united in marriage to Agnes Peterson,
